data.title: Inception
data.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

instructions: Change the value of the key 'is_classic' to true.

ground_truth.title: Inception
ground_truth.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

modification: A new key 'is_classic' with value True was added.
